reviews.review: One of the best cooperative games ever. Didnt finish single player yet, but so far so good. Like really good.

Portal 1 was a really good game.
Nice idea, great execution.
Portal 2 in the other hand... HOLY FUCKING SHIT THIS IS LIKE A FUCKING MASTERPIECE YOU GOT THE GRAPHICS, YOU GOT J.K. SIMMONS, YOU GOT THE GAMEPLAY, YOU GOT LASERS, YOU GOT THE SENTIENT PLANKS, YOU GOT THE CUTE ROBOTS, IT'S GOT EVERYTHING
JESUS CHRIST THIS IS ONE OF THE GREATEST SEQUELS OF ALL TIME AND IS RIGHTFULLY DESERVING OF HIGHEST RATED GAME ON STEAM OF ALL TIME. 10/10
I am a mainly Online player..... This is my new favorite game, if your on the fence about it GET IT
Fucking love the narretive good gameplay and kind of addictive

This game is simply fun. It has hilarious writing, brain wrecking puzzles and a very fun multiplayer. The best of all: There are endless comunity made  chmabers and you too can create one. Is very cheap and I recommend it. Buy it now.
Great puzzles, mechanics are seamless, music is great, funny, eye-opening, heartwarming with great voice acting. One of the best games I've ever played. Flawless.

I thought Portal 1 was very good, but man, Portal 2 is so much better it makes the first game almost look lame in comparison. The humour is better (and there's more of it), the story was great and the puzzles somehow seemed more fun (although that might be me getting better).

It's a game whose reputation I didn't trust, but this one did prove to me that there's a lot of reasons for why it's hailed as a classic.
The evolving puzzles were endless amounts of fun despite being stuck at times.  Okay.  Well according to steam 12 hours.  Not endless.  There was a very satisfying ending.

Great Game one of the best ive played 100% should play portal 1 and 2 super fun glad i got these games

It's Portal 2; I don't think I need to elaborate further.  It's hilariously fun, and it was made by Valve, so you know it's going to be a fun ride.

Portal 2 is to Portal 1 like Terminator2 is to Terminator 1. Less soul but more explosions. 
The puzzles are still there, improved, and the middle part of the game drags a bit more than it should.
If u a gamer u better try this game and after that play the coop with someone
